doc.field: International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 66 Records
International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 66 Records

R. Hoe: Correspondence - 1954 strike, 1955 "bad year for business," personnel director V. Regan supports union as "democratic organization;" (later became a State Mediator); 1957-1959 absenteeism and unrest; 1962 - problems with the anti-union supervisor; 1963-1964 - relations with other unions (IAM, OEU, and Pattern-Makers) averting a strike, includes membership meetings minutes; 1969-1970 bankruptcy proceedings for the company.

Series IV: Shop Files, 1937-1979 >> R. Hoe: Correspondence - 1954 strike, 1955 "bad year for business," personnel director V. Regan supports union as "democratic organization;" (later became a State Mediator); 1957-1959 absenteeism and unrest; 1962 - problems with the anti-union supervisor; 1963-1964 - relations with other unions (IAM, OEU, and Pattern-Makers) averting a strike, includes membership meetings minutes; 1969-1970 bankruptcy proceedings for the company.
